thread.title: Can You Get Through This Post Without Spending $50
thread.title_full: Can You Get Through This Post Without Spending $50

author: Jeff Barron
title: Can You Get Through This Post Without Spending $50
text:
I am your host, Jeff. The game is simple. Try to make it through this entire post without buying something. The list may seem like it’s random, but it’s not.
Don’t plan to buy anything? That’s OK! Stay and enjoy my groanworthy jokes! I italicize each pun for maximum cringe.
Come up with a better pun? Post in the comments! I DO READ ALL THE COMMENTS!
DANGER! PUNS AHEAD! YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED! GOOD LUCK, ALL! ID: 10408011 1. A corgi bottle stopper that’s always happy to serve. View this image ›
amzn.to Its name is Corki .
Price: $8
ID: 10400501 2. A house tissue dispenser that makes you think smoke is coming out of the chimney, but it’s really a tissue. Nothing is real anymore. View this image ›
amzn.to Snot bad looking.
Price: $9
ID: 10400522 3. A travel neck support pillow that folds for a more compact form factor. View this image ›
amzn.to If you’re not a fan of grey, it comes in a few collars .
Price: $30
ID: 10400539 4. A magnetic notepad for checking off items as you run out of them. View this image ›
amzn.to There should be a checkbox for puns.
Price: $7
ID: 10400549 5. A soap/brush caddie that can hang off the edge (or around) the faucet. amzn.to It’s quite a multi-fauceted caddie.
Price: $13
ID: 10400544 6. A rock-like dog toy to skip across the water. amzn.to Dogs find it quite fetching .
Price: $11
ID: 10400596 7. Sumo egg cups to fancy up your breakfast presentation. View this image ›
amzn.to It’s good they come in packs of two. You never know when you want sumo-re .
Price: $12
ID: 10400621 8. A DIY catapult designed by Leonardo Da Vinci. View this image ›
amzn.to It can’t launch a 90kg projectile over 300 meters but don’t let that throw you off your plans.
Price: $24
ID: 10400770 9. A pirate bottle opener who demands you give him a leg up in life. View this image ›
amzn.to Pass it down to your kids and make it a leg-acy .
Price: $10
ID: 10407529 10. A pancake pen to make drawing designs super easy. View this image ›
amzn.to Casual cooks might flip out.
Price: $10
ID: 10407596 11. Survival bootlaces that have a blade and fire starter built in. amzn.to Canadian woodsmen like it, what aboot it?
Price: $15
ID: 10407635 12. An octopus ring that’s actually kinda cool. View this image ›
amzn.to I’m a sucker for jewelry like this.
Price: $16
ID: 10407697 13. Fruity toilet spray that looks alarmingly edible. View this image ›
amzn.to This ought to get you out of any smell shit-uation .
Price: $15
ID: 10407728 14. A mini popsicle mold that makes perfectly portioned pops. View this image ›
amzn.to These ought to be quite pop-ular .
Price: $14
ID: 10407792 15. A wine bottle cold brew tea infuser to make rich-tasting tea overnight. amzn.to Seems tea-riffic !
Price: $19
ID: 10407828 16. A set of erasers that you slowly shave down into a stylish hairdo. View this image ›
amzn.to Rubber?! I hardly know her!
Price: $20
ID: 10407944 17. A baking pan that’ll let you make an insane piñata cake. View this image ›
amzn.to Seems like this piñata cake would be a hit .
Price: $19
ID: 10408002 And now I’m hungry for cake. But if you’re hungry for puns, check out last week’s edition here . ID: 10408019 10414774 10414777
